resources.string: Make sure you have set up the channel as the comments in the QuickSwitchChannel class say, or you will see a blank.
There is no broadcaster in the current channel
You can swipe left and right to switch channels
Local video share will not be accessible.\n Please copy your MP4 video file to %s and change the name as localvideo.mp4.
This example demonstrates how to use the SDK to make voice calls.
This example demonstrates how to use the SDK to make audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to automatically collect audio frames and actively push them during a voice call.
This example demonstrates how to customize the functions of the remote video stream renderer during audio and video calls.

This example demonstrates how to obtain raw data through callbacks during audio and video calls, and how to return the data after it has been processed.\nPS:Bare data includes video frames and audio frames
This example demonstrates how to capture camera video frames and push them actively during audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to quickly switch channels during audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to actively pull and render remote video streams during audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to use the bypass streaming function during an audio and video call.\nPS:Need to build RTMP server.
This example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt audio and video frames during audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to actively push video files and how to share screens during audio and video calls.
This example demonstrates how to send meta information along with video frames during audio and video calls.
